code: @Test public void testUnMarshallSingleMessage() throws Exception {     resultEndpoint.expectedMessageCount(1).     // should still be a list as we turned off unwrap     resultEndpoint.message(0).body().isInstanceOf(List.class).     template.sendBody(singleRecord).     resultEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied().     // there should be 1 element in the list     List list = resultEndpoint.getReceivedExchanges().get(0).getIn().getBody(List.class).     Assert.assertEquals(1, list.size()). }
